#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int compare(const void *a,const void *b)
{
    double xx=*(double*)a;
    double yy=*(double*)b;
    if (xx < yy) return 1;
    if (xx > yy) return  -1;
    return 0;
}

double arr2[55];
int arr1[55];

bool check(int temp)
{
    bool vivek=true;
    if(temp%10 != 0)
        vivek=false;
    else
    {
        temp=temp/10;
        if(temp%10 !=0)
            vivek=false;
    }
    return vivek;
}
void process(int temp,int n)
{
    int i;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        int coun=0;
        coun=temp/arr1[i];
        temp=temp-(coun*arr1[i]);

        if(coun!=0)
            {
                if(check(arr1[i]))
                    printf("%d %d\n",arr1[i]/100,coun);
                else
                    printf("%.2lf %d\n",arr2[i],coun);
            }
    }
}
int main()
{
    //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    int it;
    for(it=1;it<=t;it++)
    {
        int n,m;
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        int i;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lf",&arr2[i]);
        }
        qsort(arr2,n,sizeof(double),compare);

        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            double temp=arr2[i]*100;
            arr1[i]=(int)round(temp);
        }

        printf("Case %d:\n",it);
        for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
        {
            double val;
            scanf("%lf",&val);
            printf("Scenario %d:\n",i);
            val=val*100;
            int temp=(int)round(val);
            process(temp,n);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
